manifest.name: ADHD Prevalence Estimate
manifest.description: Estimated prevalence of ADHD.

columns.description: The type of measure being reported.
The start date of the reporting period.
The end date of the reporting period.
The sex of the individuals.
The age group of the individuals.
The numerator for the prevalence calculation.
The denominator for the prevalence calculation.
The calculated percentage of prevalence.

manifest.name: ADHD Diagnosis: Age and Sex
manifest.description: Number of people with an ADHD diagnosis, broken down by age and sex.

columns.description: The start date of the reporting period.
The end date of the reporting period.
The type of breakdown for the data.
The primary level of the breakdown (e.g., age group).
A description of the primary level.
The identifier for the indicator being measured.
The count or value for the specified breakdown.
